info.name: Rodolfo Araujo
info.description: Software engineer passionate for working with cutting-edge technologies and learning new things.  For the lastyears, I worked mainly in developing distributed and parallel applications for optimization problems.  Morerecently I’m working with the NeoResearch group to improve the Neo blockchain technology and its ecosystem,one of the Top 15+ most valuable cryptocurrencies.

experience.name: National Institute of Cancer
